sentences.english: This basic concept is illustrated in most texts on hyd aulics.
sentences.chinese: 这个基本概念在大多数水力学教科书中已有介绍。

sentences.english: Stochastic hydraulics is a new development in the research of hydraulics.
sentences.chinese: 随机水力学是水力学研究的一个新发展。

sentences.english: Stochastic hydraulics is a new development in the research of hydraulics.
sentences.chinese: 随机水力学是水力学研究的一个新发展。

sentences.english: This division was merged into Elwood Hydraulics.
sentences.chinese: 这种分裂合并成为埃尔伍德水力学。

sentences.english: The active area scan did not reveal anything remarkable about the tray hydraulics.
sentences.chinese: 有效区域扫描并不能曝露出塔盘水力学的重要信息。

sentences.english: The nonlinear problems are one item of the main research contents of rock and soil mass hydraulics .
sentences.chinese: 非线性问题是岩土体水力学研究的主要内容之一。

sentences.english: For the study of navigation hydraulics, it is of some reference value.
sentences.chinese: 对今后研究通航水力学问题具有一定的参考价值。

sentences.english: The consideration of Constant Volume Flash was used, rigorous phase equilibrium and hydraulics was adopted in the calculation of every plate.
sentences.chinese: 引入定容闪蒸，逐极进行汽液平衡及水力学计算。

sentences.english: The joint aperture is an important parameter in the study of fissured rock mass hydraulics.
sentences.chinese: 节理张开度是裂隙岩体水力学研究中的一个重要参数。

sentences.english: Neutronics and thermal hydraulics calculation were performed to estimate the performance of the whole system.
sentences.chinese: 为评估系统的性能，进行了中子学和热工水力学计算。

sentences.english: Hydrostatics is a crucial sub-topic in sailing yacht design.
sentences.chinese: 静水力学是一个在游艇设计中至关重要的子题。

sentences.english: Obtained the services of a hydrologist to evaluate the groundwater tritium plume and to make recommendations for tracking the plume.
sentences.chinese: 获得水力学服务以评估地下水氚羽流并确认跟踪羽流。
